Plot: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.
Title: Young Adult
Actors: Charlize Theron, Patton Oswalt, Patrick Wilson, Elizabeth Reaser
tomatoConsensus: Despite its somewhat dour approach, Young Adult is a funny and ultimately powerful no-holds-barred examination of prolonged adolescence, thanks largely to a convincing performance by Charlize Theron.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 29 nominations.
